features: This SheaMoisture African Black Soap Face and Body Bar is a facial cleanser that clarifies oily, blemish-prone skin.
This facial cleanser, blended with Tamarind Extract, is a great exfoliating face wash.
Our facial cleanser, blended with Tea Tree Oil, helps gently purifies and mattify oily skin. It's one of our best facial cleansers for oily skin and a face wash for blemished prone skin.
Apply face wash to damp skin. Gently massage into the face and neck using circular motions. Rinse thoroughly. Follow up with African Black Soap Clarifying Toner.
We are sustainably produced goodness. Skin care made with love for you and your body. SheaMoisture is pioneering fair trade through Community Commerce at home and abroad.
body.description: This SheaMoisture African Black Soap Face & Body Bar is a facial cleanser that clarifies oily, blemish-prone skin. This facial cleanser, blended with Tamarind Extract, is a great exfoliating face wash. Our facial cleanser, blended with Tea Tree Oil, helps gently purifies and mattify oily skin. It's one of our best facial cleansers for oily skin and a face wash for blemished prone skin. Apply face wash to damp skin. Gently massage into the face and neck using circular motions. Rinse thoroughly. Follow up with African Black Soap Clarifying Toner. We are sustainably produced goodness. Skin care made with love for you and your body. SheaMoisture is pioneering fair trade through Community Commerce at home and abroad. This facial cleanser is formulated with no parabens, no phthalates, no mineral oil and no sulfates. It's been tested on our family for generations and never on animals. OUR STORY: SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and an entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. With every purchase you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SheaMoisture African Black Soap with Shea Butter is a Bar soap skin care cleanse specially formulated to cleanse, moisturize, and balance oily skin.

Unique & Soothing Soap Bar This lightweight moisturizing bath & body bar keeps skin hydrated while balancing oily to combination skin. Together, We Give Back With every purchase, you support our mission to reinvest back in our communities. Tried, True & Cruelty-Free Tested on friends & family for generations—never on animals. Because of Her SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa.

AFRICAN BLACK SOAP CLARIFYING FACIAL WIPES Naturally infused towelettes that remove makeup, dirt, and impurities without rinsing or drying out skin. AFRICAN BLACK SOAP BODY & FACE BAR Unique soap designed to cleanse, hydrate and calm problem skin. AFRICAN BLACK SOAP FACIAL WASH A Facial cleanser, face scrub and exfoliator to help blemish-prone skin transform into glowing skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS SOAP HYDRATES, EXFOLIATES, CLEARS UP AND MOISTURIZES all in one.
reviews.reviewText: Let me tell you something there are many products which have let me down over the years from Neutrogena to Nivea even the soaps sold in mom stores like Avon. The only thing that has ever really helped me with my skin issues are aloe soaps and drinking huge quantities of water. I've been hearing about black soap for about a decade now but I never really made the effort to find it and purchase it. Now as a bearded man my face is prone to ingrown hair and huge razor bumps at a time which have caused hair to grow in patches. I said there has to be something out there that can help me with this because the aloe soap, shea butter body wash, beard wash and lavender soap was not doing it. I decided to give this soap a try after much research because regular African black soap has a reputation on its own and so does Shea so I said both of them combined something has to work. I received this product on Friday April 13th and today on April 17th I can truly say to you all the razor bumps and rough skin on my face that I was use to is cleared up. It does not leave the skin irritated, ashy, cracked or dry but it leaves it with a nice smooth and oily finish. The soap allows new growth to grow in as well as give you a nice organic cocoa and shea smell. THIS SOAP HYDRATES, EXFOLIATES, CLEARS UP AND MOISTURIZES all in one. If you purchase go ahead and purchase 2 and make sure you don't run through it quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very fragrant and great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I switched over to this soap when I was coming off a really bad full-body contact dermatitis rash. Before using this soap, I was using Dove and when I got out of the shower, the calamine lotion had been washed off and I needed to reapply immediately. After using this soap, I'm not sure if it was because the calamine lotion was still there or because the black soap offered itch relief but I could go over halfway through my day without reapplying calamine lotion.I am a male and the scent smells awesome. I would not describe it as masculine or feminine. Unfortunately, it doesn't stick around long after the shower.I am also Black. Before using this soap, if I didn't use lotion, I would be ashy all day. With this soap, I don't need lotion. My skin isn't as moisturized as it is when I use lotion but it isn't ashy either and that's all that I care about.It lathers up really good.It seems to last a while considering the size. I'm about halfway through and I've been using it once or twice a day for 2 weeks. This isn't a very large bar of soap. If you are comparing this to a big box brand like Irish Springs, it's a pretty small bar of soap for 5 bucks. You can probably get three irish springs bars that are almost twice as big for the same price. But when you factor in quality, I think it's worth it and I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars When you love your skin feeling actually clean
reviews.reviewText: This is the only soap I've ever used that leaves my skin feeling actually clean. All other bar soaps feel built up or ineffective after a while and I just prefer to get rid of the grime from every day's work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great lather and cleans thoroughly with a different but clean smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HS sufferer, suffers no more!!!
reviews.reviewText: Let me just say this stuff is awesome. I suffer from HS and cystic acne. I also get hormonal break outs on my face and large painful cysts. I have tried so many products. I use this on my face every time I shower and all over my body especially areas that are prone to HS flares such as my underarms and inner thighs. My scars are starting to heal and the dark areas are starting to lighten. My face is the clearest I've seen it in years and I currently have zero, active cystic lesions. This hasn't happened since I was a teen and even then my face was oily and broken out. I will admit the smell is different, not bad just smells medicinal and it does slightly dry my skin. But considering that I can wear a lightweight moisturizer and the scent is minimal, I couldn't expect more from this product. I am sold, 100%. I am so very grateful to have found something that provides me relief from HS as well as being affordable and is only an extra step to my shower routine. I'm over the moon!!! Hope it helps someone else as much as it has helped me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024

reviews.reviewText: I like the soap but be aware that this is not a full sized bar of soap. It’s small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you struggle with acne, please buy this
reviews.reviewText: Look, for my entire life I've struggled with acne, cystic acne, all acne. Its so embarrassing to be a grown adult with acne and acne scarring in the corporate world. I also have acne on my back that has kept me from so many experiences like a pool or beach day and issues with intimacy. I have literally tried everything. I finally am under a dermatolgist care and my acne has subsided not ended. I saw the Makeup Guru Mykala on TikTok rave about this soap. Let me tell you, I'm almost in tears, it works so well. I have been using it for about 2 weeks and can see a HUGE improvement on my face and back. This is a dying soap (I'm dry but have not experienced peeling like other soaps or medications). Please use moisturizer.Truly so happy and honestly grateful.For reference I am on spiralatone and perviously on minocycline. The products my derm put me on are the posey line. This soap works better than that. I still use the posey moisturizer.Keywords:AcneBacnePCOSSpiralatoneMinocycline

I love this soap so much that I have it on a subscription, ever since I started using this soap for my face along with my body my skin has never been better!!! This soap along with a body glove exfoliates my skin soooo well and it’s also gentle enough to use in my face daily. It took place of my face wash. watch how fast your skin starts to clear once you start using this soap consistently

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The product changed my skin almost immediately! I'm gutted I didn't discover it sooner. I have dry acne prone skin and it's cleared my acne like nothing I've ever used before.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es lo mejor para controlar la piel grasa
reviews.reviewText: Pasé mi primer embarazo con la cara llena de granitos porque mi piel es grasosa, pero en mi 2° embarazo eso no fue un problema porque conocí éste jabón y pasó todo ese tiempo y aún hoy sigo con la completamente libre de grasas y granitos; Es lo mejor que he probado.
